description:
Kanade and Ouka go into a haunted house for the mission to make Ouka cry, however because of her fear, she reverts into a little child. Kanade throws out the mission and decides to help the scared Ouka out of the haunted house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: (1) Jinsei wa, Sentaku no Renzoku de Aru (2) Jinsei wa, Sentaku no Renzoku de Aru
1: Life Is a Series of Choices 2: Life Is a Series of Chores
La vie est une succession de choix / La vie est une succession de lessives
①人生は, 選択の連続である ②人生は, 洗濯の連続である
